idea.title: The first Czech Vue.js conference
idea.a1: Vue.js is dynamic, flexible and fast evolving technology that is competing with the most popular frontend development stacks (React, Angular).
idea.a2: Vue.js can be used whenever you need to create a web-based application. Ranging from static HTML presentation, complex dynamic web or even a mobile app, Vue is a suitable choice.
idea.q3: Why is Vue better than other alternatives?
idea.a3: Vue.js is easy to learn, scalable, highly performant thanks to coherent reactivity system and has a rich ecosystem of surrounding libraries.
idea.idea: However, this great tool still remains unknown for a lot of people. That's why we are holding this conference to talk about it more.
idea.action: Are you ready to know more about Vue?
idea.more: Who will I see and what will I hear?

features.title: What more can you expect?
features.technology: Cool technology to enhance your portfolio.
